bdi4jade.plan

Class PlanLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.plan.PlanLibrary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlanLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the plan library of a capability. It aggregates the plans that can be used to achieve goals.
    Author:
    ingrid
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected PlanLibrary()
      The default constructor.
        PlanLibrary(Capability capability)
      Creates a plan library associated with a capability.
        PlanLibrary(Capability capability, java.util.Set<Plan> plans)
      Creates a plan library base associated with a capability and adds the plans in the provided set.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlanLibrary

        protected PlanLibrary()
        The default constructor. It should be only used if persistence frameworks are used.

      • PlanLibrary

        public PlanLibrary(Capability capability)
        Creates a plan library associated with a capability.
        Parameters:
        capability - the capability with which this plan library is associated.

      • PlanLibrary

        public PlanLibrary(Capability capability,
           java.util.Set<Plan> plans)
        Creates a plan library base associated with a capability and adds the plans in the provided set.
        Parameters:
        capability - the capability with which this plan library is associated.
        plans - the initial plans

    • Method Detail

      • addDefaultPlans

        protected void addDefaultPlans()
        Adds a set of default plans to this library. It adds plans to achieve the sequential and parallel goals. This method may be overridden by children capabilities.

      • addPlan

        public void addPlan(Plan plan)
        Adds a plan to the plan library.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan to be added.

      • canAchievePlans

        public java.util.Set<Plan> canAchievePlans(Goal goal)
        Returns the set of plans that can achieve the given goal. It checks this plan library and the plan library of the part capabilities, recursively.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be achieved.
        Returns:
        the set of plans that can achieve the goal.

      • canHandle

        public boolean canHandle(jade.lang.acl.ACLMessage message)
        Returns true if there is a plan that can process the given message. It checks this plan library and the plan library of the part capabilities, recursively.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if a plan can process the message, false otherwise.

      • getCapability

        public Capability getCapability()
        Returns the capability with which this plan library is associated.
        Returns:
        the capability.

      • getPlans

        public java.util.Set<Plan> getPlans()
        Returns the set of plans that are part of this plan library.
        Returns:
        the plans.

      • hasPlan

        public boolean hasPlan(Plan plan)
        Checks if a plan is part of the plan library.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the plan library contains the plan.

      • removePlan

        public boolean removePlan(Plan plan)
        Removes a plan from the plan library.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the plan was removed, false otherwise.
